TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrueTypeFontMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how a printer handles text that is formatted with a TrueType font.

span.span: Specifies how a printer handles text that is formatted with a TrueType font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TrueType 字体*向量*字体，它指示打印机驱动程序和屏幕驱动程序如何绘制字母的形状和填充它们。TrueType fonts are *vector* fonts, which instruct printer drivers and screen drivers how to draw the shapes of the letters and fill them in. 与之相反的矢量字体*光栅*字体，它是只需列表。Vector fonts contrast with *raster* fonts, which are simply lists. 光栅字体具有每个字母的每个可用的字号，列表和列表确定是否要打印的信中的每个像素。A raster font has a list for each letter of each available font size, and the lists determine, for every pixel in the letter, whether it prints. 您可以放大或缩小到几乎任意点大小; 的矢量字体但是，因为它们将占用大量的打印机内存矢量字体可能会降低打印。You can enlarge or reduce vector fonts to almost any point size; however, vector fonts can slow printing because they occupy a large amount of printer memory. 此外，某些打印机不支持 TrueType 字体。Also, some printers do not support TrueType fonts. 较新的打印机通常通过执行以下操作避免这些问题。Newer printers often avoid these problems by doing the following. - 将 TrueType 字体转换成轮廓字体，这是一种通用的矢量字体。Converting a TrueType font into an outline font, which is a generic vector font. 不支持 TrueType 字体的许多打印机支持矢量字。Many printers that do not support TrueType fonts, do support outline fonts. - 创建临时光栅字体看上去如同 TrueType 字体。Creating a temporary raster font that looks just like a TrueType font. 打印机必须创建每个文档使用的字体大小的单独临时光栅字体。The printer must create a separate temporary raster font for each font size that the document uses. 出于此原因，如果打印作业使用许多字体大小，打印机使用的总内存可能会比 TrueType 字体更高版本。For that reason, if a print job uses many font sizes, the total memory that the printer uses might be greater than what a TrueType font would use. - 在文档中的每个文本区域视为一个图形。Treating each text area in the document as a graphic. 如果设备需要包含很少文本对文档进行打印，下载的文本作为一个图形可以使用更少比下载字体的打印机内存。If a device needs to print a document that contains very little text, downloading text as a graphic can use less printer memory than downloading a font. 出于这些目的使用此类型的值：Use the values of this type for these purposes: - 作为的成员回收，这是一个属性的，这些值指示其以前的技术可用于在特定打印机。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate which of the preceding techniques is available for a particular printer. 许多打印机支持多个以下方法之一。Many printers support more than one of these techniques. - 值作为属性的，该值指示打印机以特定方式处理 TrueType 字体。As the value of the property of a , the value instructs the printer to handle TrueType fonts in a particular way. **未知**属性中永远不会使用值对象。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 绝不应设置属性设置为**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建*PrintTicket 文档*TrueType 字体处理功能设置为无法识别的选项 (即，未在中定义的选项[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)，然后使用该文档构造应用程序中的对象将具有**未知**的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the TrueType font handling feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管并类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能和配置打印的作业，以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode Automatic = int32(1)

summary.span: The printer driver decides the best method for handling TrueType fonts.

span.span: The printer driver downloads the TrueType font.

summary.span: The printer driver downloads the TrueType font as an outline font.

span.span: The printer driver downloads the TrueType font as an outline font.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode DownloadAsRasterFont = int32(3)

summary.span: The printer driver creates a raster font for each size of the TrueType font that it needs and downloads them all.

span.span: The printer driver creates a raster font for each size of the TrueType font that it needs and downloads them all.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode RenderAsBitmap = int32(5)

summary.span: The printer driver downloads each area of text as a graphic.

span.span: The printer driver downloads each area of text as a graphic.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined.

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined.
